name: As above, So below (jackietd)
description:
2 people join across dimensions. 1 in a peaceful world while the other is in a apocalyptic world. Complete objectives in the peaceful world while evading hazards in the apocalyptic world. WASD or arrow keys to move, Space to rake/attack.

Made with Godot for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with a total team of 3 people.
